alert.note: Alert for Bosque (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 7:19PM CDT until April 26 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MCLENNAN...SOUTHEASTERN BOSQUE AND SOUTHWESTERN HILL COUNTIES... At 719 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valley Mills, or 12 miles east of Clifton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waco, Robinson, Bellmead, Woodway, Lacy-Lakeview, West, Whitney, Beverly Hills, Laguna Park, Valley Mills, Lake Waco, Aquilla Lake, Lake Whitney State Park, Lake Whitney, Northcrest, China Spring, Gholson, Abbott, Ross and Cedar Shores. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Texas. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
